Trigger.Name: 0 DPS slut (punish DPSing through higher opacity overlays)

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: No commendations? You are so useless.
Only one commendation? Try harder, slut.
It looks like you did alright. Good girl.
You served your team well. Good girl.
How are you this bad? Say sorry!
You dumb slut let someone die, apologize!
